articles.title: NASA Tests New Spacecraft Propellant Gauge on Lunar Lander - NASA
articles.description: A NASA-developed fuel measurement technology, the Radio Frequency Mass Gauge, will be demonstrated on a journey to the Moon.
articles.content: Editor’s note, Feb. 6, 2024: This article has been updated to clarify that the Radio Frequency Mass Gauge estimates how much propellant is available in a tank. It does not make an exact measurement.… [+2547 chars]
